item.title: Bit Manipulation
item.description: Bit Manipulation on Scalar. XORs have 2 important property other than commutative and associativity. Identity element : $A \oplus 0 = A$ Self-Inverse : $A \oplus A = 0$ XOR is monotonic in absolute difference between numbers. All about XOR Bit Play Number of 1 Bits Standard loop thru digits and do if(N & (1 << i)) cnt++; Number of Zeroes Keep counting zeroes from backwards and break when u encounter a 1.
